entry.title: merlin goes back in time
entry.summary:
Author: AndillScreamTillTheAirinmyLungsCollapse

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 781Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: I'd yet again failed to notice an important detail as a twig snaps under my boot, making the group of knights draw their blades. "Who's there? Show yourself!" The one that looks like him asks, its a stupid question really."That's a good question, friend. Who am I? It's not like I remember…" I speak with confidence but still trail off at the end, not to be heard by anyone but myself. As I wait for a response from him, the one that told the tavern story speaks up.

entry.title: Some and Now None of You
entry.summary:
Author: Isthisusernameavailableornot

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,649Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 168

Summary: "Let him think I hate him. If that’ll stop him from risking his neck for me over and over again, then it’s a sacrifice I don’t have to think twice about." — Arthur finds out Merlin has magic. He also finds out how often Merlin risked his life for him and so, he does the only thing he can think of to protect him: banishment. Hurt and angry, Merlin leaves and swears to not look back. But, when two years pass and Morgana shows up at Merlin’s door, urging him to fill Gaius’ position as Court Physician, Merlin agrees. He really doesn’t know why, but Arthur is sure Merlin would do just about anything to get on his nerves. Unprepared for the shock of seeing Merlin back in the castle, Arthur is forced to speed along his plans to lift the ban on magic. But between stubborn councilors, a mysterious plague, a still angry Merlin, and Morgana being Morgana, Arthur is fairly certain he’ll lose his mind before the first year of his reign even ends.

entry.title: Unbreakable Chains
entry.summary:
Author: Ireadtoomanybooks

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,792Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 152

Summary: Merlin never wanted to come to Camelot. But with his home reduced to ashes and nowhere else to turn, he has no choice but to seek refuge with his uncle, a court physician under King Uther’s rule. All he wants is a quiet life—one of healing, learning, and keeping his strange gifts hidden.But the moment he steps within Camelot’s walls, he feels it. A presence watching. A hunger waiting.Prince Arthur Pendragon is nothing like the noble protector of legends. He is ruthless, possessive, and drawn to Merlin in ways neither of them fully understand. Every time Merlin tries to escape, Arthur is there to catch him—tender, terrifying, and utterly unwilling to let him go.

entry.title: Worth My Weight In Your Image
entry.summary:
Author: livinginthetheater

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,287Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Someone in the Camelot (Merlin) has rooted out a spy on the council. This anonymous person (who is obviously Merlin) put this accusation into a long letter, full of evidence from a thorough investigation and infiltration of the spy's circle within the staff. Arthur is remarkably impressed with this mystery detective (again, Merlin) and becomes set on uncovering their identity.Merlin didn't think things would get out of hand. He only wanted to get rid of the spy publicly and legally, so he forewent the magic and decided to conduct a counterintelligence mission for months to gather evidence the old-fashioned way—like anyone would! But suddenly Arthur is searching for him, and magic or not, he learned a long time ago to stay in the shadows.George is so tired. It is so obvious. King Arthur is disappointingly unobservant, and George cannot take this much longer.

entry.title: Heart of Albion
entry.summary:
Author: Lightnessmoon

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,621Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 182

Summary: She thought he had got married. She thought Camelot had not changed.Merlyn returns to Camelot after learning healing magic from the druids. Camelot looks and feels the same. Worse so does a certain King.A King she has been best friends with for years. A King she believed got married. It was this news that broke her heart. She needed time to heal herself.She is not aware until she returns Arthur did not marry Gwen.Arthur hasn't changed in her time away. He is still completely overprotective of her.Merlyn is completely oblivious. She thought time away would heal her heart. Being back in Camelot rekindles her feelings. She and Arthur could never possibly be.For one she is the very thing she could get killed for: magic.But not all is as it seems. Magic is not outlawed. The biggest thing of all is that Merlyn has no idea that she is the one Arthur is engaged to.

entry.title: Falling twice
entry.summary:
Author: Theroundbartable

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,651Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 53

Summary: "Have we met?” Arthur insisted, shaking his head. “You seem – familiar.”Last time, Merlin had not thought about those words, but this time they hit him hard. Arthur may not know it, hadn’t known it then, but he’d recognised Merlin. Not because he was familiar by a meeting of chance, but because their souls were intertwined by fate. And yet, it ate away at Merlin that if things were easier, if things were better, Arthur would have simply remembered.

entry.title: love me like you used to (and i’ll praise you like i should)
entry.summary:
Author: moonlit_author

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,233Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 104

Summary: Five years ago, Merlin was exiled from Camelot under Crown Prince Arthur’s orders. His friend, his destiny. And secretly, Merlin could admit that Arthur would probably be the only man he’d ever love.One year ago, Arthur became King after his father passed due to an unknown illness. He governs his people alone and bears it as best as he can. After all, it is what he deserves after that day, five years ago.But attacks have become rampant ever since he took the throne. A mysterious group of sorcerers marked with a similar showing a full moon have started to appear and become notorious. Merlin and Arthur will come to meet again to, once again, save Camelot.—In other words. I’m dramatic. They pine and fight together with their friends by their side. Aren’t you glad it isn’t that complicated?

entry.title: I Was Born From and With It
entry.summary:
Author: Jpg_26862

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,762Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 91

Summary: He had touched magic. He whipped around, his eyes feeling like they were popping out of his skull as he gaped at Arthur. He curled his magic around Arthur, searching, seeking out the sparks he had felt moments before. And there it was. Pulsing through his veins, heightening with his enjoyment of his hunt, quickening his reaction times, making him move faster, pushing him forward. Merlin couldn’t speak a single word, even as Arthur shoved him up against a wall and ordered some of the knights around him to throw him in the dungeons. The Crown Prince of Camelot had magic, and he didn’t even know it.With Merlin's arrival in Camelot, secrets long buried are revealed from every corner, and magic runs deep.

Summary: “Let me get this straight, you don’t want to share a bed with me but you willingly shared one with Gwaine?” Arthur sneers, and he doesn’t really understand why that irritates him so.“Exactly” Merlin just brushes it off.“And why not?” Arthur presses on, intent on getting Merlin to talk. After all, they are in this hostel together. In the last available room, with one bed.“Gwaine is a friend”“A friend?”“Yes… a friend. With benefits”“Benefits?” Arthur’s voice is exasperated, like he cannot believe it.-OR-There was only one room. With only one bed.Arthur wants to share, out of the goodness of his heart.
